publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2580 Mr Andy Kerr: Education (Disability Strategies and Pupils' Records) (Scotland) Bill: Financial Resolution-That the Parliament for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Education (Disability Strategies and Pupils' Records) (Scotland) Bill, agrees to any increase in expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund in consequence of the Act. Supported by: Cathy Jamieson*, Nicol Stephen*, Peter Peacock*

S1M-2580 Mr Andy Kerr: Education (Disability Strategies and Pupils' Records) (Scotland) Bill: Financial Resolution—That the Parliament for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Education (Disability Strategies and Pupils’ Records) (Scotland) Bill, agrees to any increase in expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund in consequence of the Act. Supported by: Cathy Jamieson, Nicol Stephen, Peter Peacock
